Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Great place for a party!!! Great music, laid back atmosphere. The owner and staff are so great and made sure we were taken care of. DJ booth upstairs, good for small or large groups, layout means it works well for all different purposes. Also love popping in here for a casual drink anytime and always has a friendly welcoming vibe!!!

Name: Havelaar
Review Text:
Great beer, and even more great ambiance. The bartender is very nice and welcoming.
Highly recommend!!

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Cool bar,  and patrons. Kind of an eclectic mix of folks enjoying good local brews..  Lots of artist and (american) hippies as well as british drum and bass types.

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Great bar with great art by local street artists, very fun place to have a drink

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Spacious with great atmosphere and nice sound system. Street Fighter 2 is a nice addition

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Nice place, nice owner from Boston. We spent very good time there

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Nice place to drink nice beers. The owner is awesome.

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Incredibly friendly staff! Cheap beer prices, especially for being in the center of the city. Awesome events like Cheeky Monday. Always a fun place to be!

Name: Havelaar
Review Text:
We went here for a drink after purchasing fries across the road.

Very friendly bartender and after buying fries ok the street, the perfect place to sit down and have a beer while you eat your snack.

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Going to be the best place in the city center for a proper good beer and great crowd of people, post pandemic.

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: For everyone whom has a good taste in music should visit on monday, friday or saturday for Cheeky.

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: I have been living in the Netherlands for 2,5 years, and I have never seen a person more rude than the owner of this place. Such a shame that this kind of people still exist!

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Great place with affordable beers! So good since it changed management and had renovations done

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Good place for drinks going along your fries from across the street. They forgot about our order of bitterballen though, but made it up by serving a bigger portion.

Name: Havelaar
Review Text: Nice spot!  Mike gave great service and went out of his way to make our stop fun! Definitely put it on your list.
